en.title: 10 Easy DIY Cat Toy Ideas You Can Make at Home
en.content:
You don't need expensive toys to make your cat happy — you can create fun toys from everyday household items. Here are 10 safe and easy DIY ideas.

Cardboard Toys

1. Cardboard Maze

Connect several boxes to create a tunnel system. Cut multiple holes for entry and exit points to stimulate your cat's sense of exploration.

2. Cardboard House

Simply cut windows and a door into a large cardboard box. Cats love cozy, enclosed spaces.

String and Fabric Toys

3. Sock Toy

Fill a sock with catnip (or silver vine) and tie it shut. You can toss it for your cat to chase.

4. T-Shirt Tent

Use two wire hangers and a T-shirt to build a small tent for your cat.

Plastic Bottle Toys

5. Treat Dispenser Bottle

Cut holes in the side of a plastic bottle and fill it with kibble. When your cat rolls it, treats come out — a great puzzle toy.

6. Bottle Caps

A simple bottle cap can keep cats entertained as they bat it around. Make sure the cap is large enough that it can't be swallowed.

Other Ideas

7. Paper Bag Tunnel

Cut the bottom off a paper bag to make a tube. The crinkly sound attracts cats. Be sure to remove the handles first.

8. Egg Carton Treasure Hunt

Place treats in the compartments of an egg carton and let your cat figure out how to get them out.

9. Paper Towel Roll Wand

Thread string or ribbon through a paper towel roll to create a simple wand toy.

10. Ice Toy (Summer Only)

Freeze treats in an ice cube tray. A refreshing play activity for hot days.

Safety Precautions

Watch out for small parts that could be swallowed, plastic bags that pose a suffocation risk, and strings that could become wrapped around your cat. Always put toys away after playtime.

zh.title: 10个简单DIY猫玩具创意：在家就能做
zh.content:
不需要买昂贵的玩具，用家里现成的材料就能做出让猫咪开心的玩具。以下是10个安全又简单的DIY创意。

纸箱类

1. 纸箱迷宫

把几个纸箱连接起来做成隧道。开几个出入口的洞，可以激发猫咪的探索欲。

2. 纸箱小屋

在大纸箱上开出窗户和门就行了。猫咪就是喜欢狭小的空间。

绳子·布料类

3. 袜子逗猫玩具

把猫薄荷（或木天蓼）装进袜子里打个结就完成了。可以扔给猫咪追着玩。

4. T恤帐篷

用两个铁丝衣架和一件T恤就能搭出一个小帐篷。

塑料瓶类

5. 零食漏食瓶

在塑料瓶侧面开几个洞，往里面装猫粮。猫咪滚动瓶子就会掉出食物，是很好的益智玩具。

6. 瓶盖玩具

一个瓶盖就能让猫咪玩得不亦乐乎。请确认瓶盖大小不会被猫咪吞下。

其他

7. 纸袋隧道

把纸袋底部剪开做成筒状。沙沙的声音很吸引猫咪。一定要先把提手剪掉。

8. 鸡蛋盒寻宝

在鸡蛋盒的各个格子里放上零食，让猫咪自己寻找。

9. 保鲜膜纸芯逗猫棒

在保鲜膜纸芯中穿入绳子或丝带做成逗猫棒。

10. 冰块玩具（仅限夏天）

在冰格里放入零食冻成冰块。是夏天消暑玩耍的好选择。

安全注意事项

注意小零件误吞、塑料袋窒息风险以及绳子缠绕的危险。玩完之后一定要收好玩具。
